message: I think this is a fair split, Bob. You get a good starting point and I get the majority.  Let's get this done!
You got a big share last time, now it's my turn to get a fair deal.
Okay, Bob.  I understand wanting a bigger share.  Let's meet in the middle this time. This is a fair compromise, and if we continue to argue, we both lose money.
You're trying to squeeze me out, but I'm not going down without a fight. This is my best offer so far.
Bob, we're getting nowhere with this. Let's split it evenly and stop wasting time and money. We're both losing out with every round.
